amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Healthy Start Program by $24.8 million and decreases General Departmental Management in the Office of the Secretary by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 145 printed in House Report 115-297 to increase funding for the Healthy Start Program by $24.8 million and decrease General Departmental Management in the Office of the Secretary by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A132) Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 175 (Roll no. 502).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A132) Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 175 (Roll no. 502).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A132) offered by Mr. Kildee.
